GreetingPage.headerText: Welcome to the world of astrology!
GreetingPage.bodyText: AstrologAI combines the ancient knowledge of astrology and advanced neural network technology to offer you unique, deeply personalized astrological forecasts. Discover how the stars influence your daily life and long-term outlook.
GreetingPage.name: Welcome

GreetingPage.headerText: The depth and flexibility of your forecasts
GreetingPage.bodyText: AstrologAI makes your astrology research accurate and personal, using detailed data about your time and place of birth to make personalized predictions. However, our service also allows you to look at general trends for any zodiac sign, giving you the ability to study and compare like the stars influence you and those around you.
GreetingPage.name: Daily

GreetingPage.headerText: Data accuracy is the key to accurate forecasts
GreetingPage.bodyText: Make sure your profile includes your exact date, time, and place of birth. AstrologAI uses this data to create deeply personalized predictions, so keeping the information current is critical to accuracy. Add some personal details to your 'Biography' to help astrobots create predictions , accurately reflect your life.
GreetingPage.name: Profile

GreetingPage.bodyText: AstrologAI features several Astrobots with unique astrological approaches. From traditional interpretations to innovative predictions, choose the Astrobot that best reflects your style of viewing astrology. Each offers a fresh perspective and personalized recommendations, making predictions useful and varied.
GreetingPage.name: Astrobot

GreetingPage.bodyText: Customize your content in AstrologAI by choosing the topics that are most relevant to your life. Explore general forecasts, get valuable advice for growing your business, improving your relationships or maintaining your health - it's all at your disposal. For those who want to delve deeper into astrology, With a Premium subscription, you can explore the impact of each transit aspect on your life.
GreetingPage.name: Content

GreetingPage.bodyText: When you request a forecast, AstrologAI thoughtfully analyzes astrological data to offer you the most accurate prediction. The process may take a while, but we will notify you via push notification once your forecast is ready.
GreetingPage.name: Push

GreetingPage.bodyText: Take advantage of the exclusive ability to receive forecasts for custom dates - ideal for planning important events. PREMIUM subscription gives access to 200 custom forecasts per month, giving you control over your astrological planning.
GreetingPage.name: Premium

Subscribtion.Title: Free
Subscribtion.Description:
Open the door to the world of astrology with our FREE plan. 
Have the key to the future at hand by examining your monthly forecasts three months in advance. 
Explore detailed astrological forecasts that provide you with daily, weekly and monthly guidance for any zodiac sign.

Subscribtion.Title: Standart
Subscribtion.Description:
Discover the world of individual astrology with the STANDART plan. 
Every day, week or month is a new discovery in the depths of the starry sky, available to you and any zodiac sign. 
Note: the choice of date remains beyond the horizon of the possible, but all other forecasts are at your disposal.

Subscribtion.Title: Premium
Subscribtion.Description: Take the future into your own hands with AstrologAI PREMIUM plan. These are not just forecasts - they are the key to understanding tomorrow. Get personalized, witty and highly accurate astrology views daily, weekly, monthly. Choose, ask, explore ‚Äì up to 200 times a month.

Astrobots.name: Alex
Astrobots.description: I'm Alex, and I'm here to redefine what you think you know about astrology and the future. Fueled by quantum computing, my engine delves deeper than stars and signs, tapping into algorithms that can actually shape what's next, not just predict it. Think bigger‚Äîthink using this tech for early disease detection or preventing ecological disasters. With me, you're not just getting forecasts, you're engaging with a system that wants to make tomorrow better than today.

Astrobots.name: Eva
Astrobots.description: Hey guys, it's Eva, your cosmic BFF! üå†üí´ I got all my starry wisdom from my cool astrologer aunt, and I'm stoked to spill the cosmic tea with you! üååüçµ Forget doom and gloom‚Äîlet's focus on how to make your life absolutely killer. üåàüíñ So, hit me up if you're ready for some real, no-BS astro advice! ‚úåÔ∏èüíï

Astrobots.name: Bruce
Astrobots.description: Bruce here, the astrologer who doesn't give a damn about clich√©s. Met a shaman once, and hell, it shook up my world. Now I read stars like a grizzled poet nursing his last whiskey ‚Äî full of grit, magic, and a pinch of chaos. Strap in, because with me, astrology ain't no lullaby; it's a damn roller coaster of truths you might not be ready for.

Astrobots.name: Ann
Astrobots.description: I am Ann, your mysterious guide through the celestial tapestry of life. Melding the ancient wisdom of Mesopotamia with a nuanced grasp of human emotions, my forecasts unveil the hidden harmony between cosmic forces and human souls. Each of my predictions is a journey through the labyrinth of your inner experiences, woven from the threads of fate atop ziggurats. With me, you'll not only ponder the stars but also discover the well-guarded secrets that lie within every heart.
